SEARCH
Package gw.datatype.handler

Interface IDataTypeConstraintsHandler

All Known Subinterfaces:
IDecimalConstraintsHandler, IIntegerConstraintsHandler, ILongConstraintsHandler, IMoneyConstraintsHandler, INumberConstraintsHandler, IStringConstraintsHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
CurrencyAmountConstraintsHandlerBase, DateConstraintsHandlerBase, DateOnlyConstraintsHandler, DateTimeConstraintsHandler, DecimalConstraintsHandler, DecimalConstraintsHandlerBase, IntegerConstraintsHandler, IntegerConstraintsHandlerBase, LongConstraintsHandlerBase, PastDateTimeConstraintsHandler, StringConstraintsHandler, StringConstraintsHandlerBase, TypeKeyConstraintsHandler
public interface IDataTypeConstraintsHandler
Handler for validating datatype constraints.
Author:
pdalbora

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Iterable<? extends CharSequence>
    getConsistencyCheckerPredicates(String columnName)
    Returns a group of SQL predicates that should be true for this datatype, for the given column.
    Iterable<? extends CharSequence>
    getLoaderValidationPredicates(String columnName)
    Same as getConsistencyCheckerPredicates(String), except that the checks apply to the staging tables.
    void
    validateUserInput(Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property, String strValue)
    Checks that the given user input represents a valid value for the datatype.
    void
    validateValue(Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property, Object value)
    Checks that the given object represents a valid value for the datatype.

  • Method Details

    • validateUserInput

      void validateUserInput(Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property, String strValue)
      Checks that the given user input represents a valid value for the datatype.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the object that owns the property to which the value corresponds. May be null.
      property - the property to which the value corresponds. May be null.
      strValue - the user input, as a string. Not null.
      Throws:
      DataTypeException - if the value is invalid

    • validateValue

      void validateValue(Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property, Object value)
      Checks that the given object represents a valid value for the datatype.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the object that owns the property to which the value corresponds. May be null.
      property - the property to which the value corresponds. May be null.
      value - the object. Not null. Implementations can assume that the value will be an instance of the datatype's value type.
      Throws:
      DataTypeException - if the value is invalid

    • getConsistencyCheckerPredicates

      Iterable<? extends CharSequence> getConsistencyCheckerPredicates(String columnName)
      Returns a group of SQL predicates that should be true for this datatype, for the given column.
      Parameters:
      columnName - the name of the column in the database
      Returns:
      a group of SQL predicates, representing a disjunction. If any of the returned predicates returns true for a value in the given column, the check will fail for that row.

    • getLoaderValidationPredicates

      Iterable<? extends CharSequence> getLoaderValidationPredicates(String columnName)
      Same as getConsistencyCheckerPredicates(String), except that the checks apply to the staging tables.
      See Also:
      • getConsistencyCheckerPredicates(String)
